item.description:
Let's see if our radio skills are up to par with the controllers at EWB.

It has been known to endure attitude on approach or maybe on departure, but the scallops are worth it!

“The Airport Grille has reopened under new owners, in an expanded and fully renovated location in the New Bedford terminal, with the same chef it had before. This is a fine restaurant with excellent food, even by non-airport standards. It's obviously already a very popular stop for pilots from all over the Northeast. Check the daily specials for seafood dishes, at both lunch and dinner.”

Full menu at http://www.airportgri....
(508) 99-GRILL

Make sure ATC knows you're going to New Bedford KEWB, not Bedford.

http://www.menujoy.co....
http://www.airnav.com....

New Bedford Airport is a short hop of 63NM
http://www.navmonster....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Steve and Patty and 6090L in front of the terminal (finally out of annual)

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Come back to the Airport Grille, KEWB Adventure in radio work
